meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lazy or idle.
meanings.sent1: Her slothfulness was evident in her reluctance to do any work.
meanings.sent2: His slothfulness often led to missed deadlines at work.
meanings.sent3: The slothfulness of the cat made it the laziest pet in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The slothfulness of the old car was evident in its slow acceleration.
meanings.sent5: The slothfulness of the sloth itself was a sight to behold in the forest.

meanings.definition: A tendency to be sluggish or indolent.
meanings.sent1: The slothfulness of the student was noticeable in his slow movements.
meanings.sent2: Despite his slothfulness, he managed to complete the task.
meanings.sent3: The slothfulness of the turtle in the race was unexpected but amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her slothfulness in decision-making cost her the opportunity of a lifetime.
meanings.sent5: The slothfulness of the river's flow mirrored his own lack of urgency.
